contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Vodafone Qatar Announces New Appointments to Its Management Team

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Vodafone Qatar has announced new appointments to the company’s Management Team.

Mr Mahmud Awad has been appointed as Chief Business Officer and Mr Ramy Reyad as Chief Technology Officer.

With 18 years of telecom experience, Mr Awad joins Vodafone Qatar from du where he was the VP of Corporate Sales leading a sales team of 100. During his time at du Mr Awad created new revenue streams, introduced more industry specific solutions and established an end-to-end solution sales approach.

Mr Awad has also held executive roles with Neoris, Al Wataniya Telecom and Nokia Siemens Networks.

Mr Reyad has over 15 years of experience in telecoms and joins Vodafone Qatar from Mobilink. As Mobilink’s Chief Technology Officer he successfully transformed the Mobilink Technical department to optimize cost and investment. He also directed critical technical projects and oversaw the rollout of new capacity projects.

Mr Reyad will lead Vodafone into its next phase including LTE 4G launch and ensuring Vodafone’s state of the art infrastructure supports Qatar’s knowledge based economy.

To read the full article on Vodafone Qatar's website, please click here.
